QuestData.Title: Share the Wealth
QuestData.Description:
<Though old and mud covered, this is still gold, lots of it! It's not enough to be Nedly's legendary lost treasure, but it's still several thousand in gold coins.
It's a significant find, and should be returned to Shealds to be split among all the workers.>
QuestData.RewardText: Some people would have just run off with this, but you didn't! We'll split this up into two hundred and fourteen shares. Here's your cut.
